For a Few Dollars More

Rank: 826


Two bounty killers with similar intentions but different motivations team up to take down a psychotic Mexican outlaw before he and his gang can carry out an audacious bank robbery.


Director: Sergio Leone

Writer: Sergio Leone, Fulvio Morsella, Luciano Vincenzoni

Stars: Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volont√®

Tags: One,Person Army Action, Period Drama, Quest, Spaghetti Western, Drama, Western
